title: Yoann Barelli Rides Whistler… On a Guerrilla Gravity Hardtail
content: Well, mark this up to something you don’t see every day. Yoann Barelli is best known for his course previews, where he follows a pro downhill racer and narrates the tracks’ bumps and jumps. Today though, he’s taking on Whistler… on the new Guerrilla Gravity hardtail.
author: prolly
